title: Народ хочет знать
overview: A weekly talk show on topics of interest to the majority of the population of Russia. Journalists and sociologists are present in the hall. Journalists ask questions from themselves, and if necessary, ask their families. The task of sociologists is to draw up a portrait, requests and expectations of the society, the model of which is presented in the hall, on the basis of what they heard during the program, and compare the assessments in the hall with all-Russian research.
